author: Omar Rashid
text:
The Vishwa Hindu Parishad is all set to take its Ram temple in Ayodhya movement to the rural areas across the country.

The organisation has announced that it would organise a “Ram Mahotsav” to build support for the temple.

The VHP’s latest programme is to reach out to 1.25 lakh villages. “A Ram Mahotsav will be held across the country from April 8 to 19. During this period, Lord Ram will be worshipped in every village. Through archanas , light will be thrown on his religious persona and his significance today,” Sharad Sharma, VHP spokesperson, said.
title: VHP plans Ram Mahotsav across the country
